sentences.en: Despite 2010 starting and ending with much of the country swathed in snow, threatened species such as the puffin and the rare heath fritillary butterfly enjoyed successful breeding seasons.
sentences.cn: 尽管2010年开始和结束时，英国的大部分地区都被大雪覆盖，对人们来说不算是好天气。 但英国的国民托管组织声称：在这一年里，英国的很多濒危物种，比如埃克斯莫尔的珍稀希斯豹纹蝶、坎布里亚郡的网纹毛毡衣蝶还有法内尔岛上的海雀，都很享受这适合繁殖的一年，数量大大增加。

sentences.en: N Pacific puffin having a large yellow plume over each eye.
sentences.cn: 北太平洋的海鹦,每只眼睛上方有一簇黄色的羽毛.

sentences.en: The Hatfield Puffin is a modern aeroplane, but its designer, Mr. John Wimpenny , is finding it difficult to get it off the ground.
sentences.cn: 哈特费尔德·普芬是一架时髦的飞机, 但设计这架飞机的人约翰·温佩尼先生感到很难使它飞离地面.

trans.tran_en: a North Atlantic seabird with a black and white body and a large brightly coloured beak
